verses.text: \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scourged|strong="G3146"\w* \add him\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w platted|strong="G4120"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w thorns|strong="G0173"\w*, and \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \add it\add* \w on|strong="G2007"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they put \w on|strong="G4016"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hail|strong="G5463"\w*, \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*! \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w smote|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* with their \w hands|strong="G4475"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1854"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w*, I \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G1854"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w fault|strong="G0156"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w forth|strong="G1854"\w*, \w wearing|strong="G5409"\w* the \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w thorns|strong="G0174"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add Pilate\add* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*!

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they cried \w out|strong="G2905"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \add him\add*, \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \add him\add*. \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Take|strong="G2983"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \add him\add*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w fault|strong="G0156"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* he \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

¶ \w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G5126"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w was|strong="G5399"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the judgment \w hall|strong="G4232"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Whence|strong="G4159"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*? \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w answer|strong="G0612"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Speakest \w thou|strong="G2980"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*? knowest \w thou|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* to \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* to \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou couldest have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+add at all\+add* \+w against|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w it were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w from above|strong="G0509"\+w*: \+w therefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w delivered|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the greater|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w*.\wj*

And \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w thenceforth|strong="G5127"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* sought \w to|strong="G2212"\w* \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w let|strong="G0630"\w* this \w man|strong="G5126"\w* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*, thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Cæsar’s|strong="G2541"\w* \w friend|strong="G5384"\w*: \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* a \w king|strong="G0935"\w* speaketh \w against|strong="G0483"\w* \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*.

¶ When \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G5126"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w forth|strong="G1854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* that is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Pavement|strong="G3038"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* in the \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, \w Gabbatha|strong="G1042"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w preparation|strong="G3904"\w* of the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w*!

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they cried \w out|strong="G2905"\w*, Away \w with|strong="G0142"\w* \add him\add*, away \w with|strong="G0142"\w* \add him\add*, \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Shall I \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w*? The chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, We \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* delivered \w he|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \add him\add* \w away|strong="G0520"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w bearing|strong="G0941"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \add the place\add* of a \w skull|strong="G2898"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* in the \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w*:

\w Where|strong="G3699"\w* they \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, on \w either|strong="G1782"\w* side \w one|strong="G1782"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* in the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* a \w title|strong="G5102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \add it\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w writing|strong="G1125"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w* OF \w NAZARETH|strong="G3480"\w* THE \w KING|strong="G0935"\w* OF THE \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5126"\w* \w title|strong="G5102"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* crucified \w was|strong="G4717"\w* \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w* to the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* in \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, \add and\add* \w Greek|strong="G1676"\w*, \add and\add* \w Latin|strong="G4515"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* to \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w Write|strong="G1125"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, The \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.
\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w What|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w* I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they had \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w*, to \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* a \w part|strong="G3313"\w*; and \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add his\add* \w coat|strong="G5509"\w*: \w now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w coat|strong="G5509"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* without \w seam|strong="G0729"\w*, \w woven|strong="G5307"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w top|strong="G0509"\w* \w throughout|strong="G3650"\w*.

They \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, Let \w us|strong="G4977"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w rend|strong="G4977"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* cast \w lots|strong="G2975"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w whose|strong="G5101"\w* it shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, which \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, They \w parted|strong="G1266"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w* among \w them|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w vesture|strong="G2441"\w* they did \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*. These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w*, \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* the \add wife\add* of \w Cleophas|strong="G2832"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*.

When \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* his \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* standing \w by|strong="G3936"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w loved|strong="G0025"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*!\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1534"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj  \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*!\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* that \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \add home.\add*

¶ \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* were \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w accomplished|strong="G5055"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G5048"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w I thirst|strong="G1372"\+w*.\wj*

\w Now|strong="G3767"\w* there was \w set|strong="G2749"\w* a \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* a \w spunge|strong="G4699"\w* with \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G4060"\w* \add it\add* upon \w hyssop|strong="G5301"\w*, and \w put|strong="G4374"\w* \add it\add* to \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* had \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w It is finished|strong="G5055"\+w*:\wj* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w bowed|strong="G2827"\w* his \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, and gave \w up|strong="G3860"\w* the \w ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the \w preparation|strong="G3904"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w should|strong="G3306"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w remain|strong="G3306"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*, (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* an \w high|strong="G3173"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*,) \w besought|strong="G2065"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w legs|strong="G4628"\w* might be \w broken|strong="G2608"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* they might be taken \w away|strong="G0142"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brake|strong="G2608"\w* the \w legs|strong="G4628"\w* of the \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w crucified|strong="G4957"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, and saw \w that|strong="G1492"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w dead|strong="G2348"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w*, they \w brake|strong="G2608"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w legs|strong="G4628"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* with a \w spear|strong="G3057"\w* \w pierced|strong="G3572"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w side|strong="G4125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2117"\w* came there \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \add it\add* bare \w record|strong="G3140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w record|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w*: and \w he|strong="G2548"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* might \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* were \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* should be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, A \w bone|strong="G3747"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G4937"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w broken|strong="G4937"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, They shall \w look|strong="G3700"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* him \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w pierced|strong="G1574"\w*.
